typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as short,
		voornaam as string,
		achternaam as string,
		geboortedatum as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> mytestfile
mytestfile aggregate(groupBy(voornaam),
	each(match(name != 'id'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink
